openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1
paths:
  /pets:
    post:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Created Pet
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: 'subdirectory/petstore.yaml#/components/schemas/Pet'
